item.title: Chaire of Design Jean Prouvé
item.description: Inaugurale lecture ⌈Recent writings⌋ La diversité dans l’enseignement du design et des métiers d’art doit faire école ⌈Courses⌋ Design Master Cnam·CESAAP in residence at the Academia of climate in Paris ⌈Teaching⌋ Design research (DSN201) · Reflective practices (DSN202) · Digital skills for professional transition (TET007) ⌈Events⌋ Research seminar Mediums in design with Annie Gentès, CY École de design ⌈Projects⌋ Scuola del non sapere with Ruedi Baur and Civic City · TransFabriC at CNAM ⌈Pierre Lévy⌋ prof.
